docs.text: FlowMate Documentation Portal Automate your workflows with FlowMate. To access FlowMate, visit flowmate.io . What is FlowMate FlowMate helps you to connect any app with an API with any other, and manipulate its data with little or no code. FlowMate allows you to: 1. Sync data between 200+ apps Move and transform data between different apps and databases without getting caught up in API docs and troubleshooting CORS errors. 2. Design powerful workflows Go beyond ETL: start with simple no-code flows and add javascript functions, conditional logic, or custom http requests in a snap. 3. Create custom integrations Design bespoke nodes for a proprietary CRM, endpoints for your product, or any other software, and empower your marketing and ops teams to create their own workflows. Contact To learn more about FlowMate, please contact Support@FlowMate .
docs.title: Home
